response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Given its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, we are confident it's worth far more than its actual cost. Considering its true worth to you, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. We look forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this valuable asset.", "product_price": 14000}
